comments: This contract was issued for A: Phase 1 - Marine Engineering services for design and preparation of contract documents for construction at 3 different facilities (Owikeno, Quatsino andKlemtu) . Phase 2 will be issued later which will included: services for assistance to Public Works and Government Services Canada during tendering and for engineering services during consturction, inlcuding contract document interpretation, shop drawing review, non-resident construction inspection and certification for payment B:Marine engineering services for facility inspection and reporting at 4 different facilities: Owikeno, Quatsino, False Bay and Kyuquot)
